name: Limb Senses
explanation: Limbs have increased sensitivity, allowing for increased perception when enemies are moving on a surface connected with the limbs.

name: Antimagic Aura
explanation: An invisible barrier surrounds this creature and its equipment. It is impervious to most magical effects including spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities. It prevents the functioning of any magic items or spells within its confines, thus preventing the target from casting spells or using spell-like abilities or magic items for the duration.

name: Dark Energy Absorption
explanation: Any dark energy that the creature is affected by, is instead absorbed healing the creature by the same damage that would have been dealt.
